hero.title: Valderrama International School
hero.subtitle: Forming Integral, Autonomous, and Competent Individuals for the 21st Century
hero.description: Montessori Methodology + Project-Based Learning + Holistic Education

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Integral and Transformative Education
mission.text: Valderrama International School is an educational institution that forms integral, autonomous, and competent individuals capable of facing the challenges of the 21st century. We provide quality education that articulates the Montessori methodology with contemporary pedagogies, developing critical thinking skills, creativity, and global citizenship.

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.title: Leaders in Pedagogical Innovation
vision.text: By 2030, Valderrama International School will be recognized as a leading institution in pedagogical innovation in Colombia, distinguished by forming graduates with excellent academic performance and 21st-century skills.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We act with honesty, coherence, and transparency.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We pursue quality in processes and results.

respect.title: Respect
respect.description: We value human dignity and diversity.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: We assume the consequences of our actions.

solidarity.title: Solidarity
solidarity.description: We work collaboratively for the common good.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We promote creativity and continuous improvement.

pbl.title: Project-Based Learning
pbl.description: Active methodology centered on real problems.

serviceLearning.title: Service Learning
serviceLearning.description: Education with social and community impact.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Education
bilingual.description: English mastery as a second language.

facilities.label: Our Facilities
facilities.title: Spaces Designed for Learning
facilities.description: Modern facilities that promote integral development.

tutoring.title: Tutoring Center
tutoring.description: Individualized education for Elementary, Middle & High School

music.title: Music
music.description: Piano, guitar, singing, and musical ensembles.
